body_html:
This issue still exists when using GTX 1080 with CUDA 8 and cuDNN 5.1, I have tried all the TF docker versions, which did not help.
PS: I am using Ubuntu 15.04 LTS, python 2.7.
I found convolution cannot work, however, using just softmax works fine!

body:
This issue still exists when using GTX 1080 with CUDA 8 and cuDNN 5.1, I have tried all the TF docker versions, which did not help.
PS: I am using Ubuntu 15.04 LTS, python 2.7.
I found convolution cannot work, however, using just softmax works fine!
